alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:38AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jackson and northeastern DeKalb Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 638 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hollywood, or near Scottsboro, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Fort Payne, Rainsville, Henagar, Sylvania, Hollywood, Powell, Section, Ider and Pisgah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
